content: Lol, Oddly enough saw an article today saying more liberals are going to church since the election. Personally I feel actions will go a lot further then pray. Recently read a novel that talked about the Hare Psychopathy Checklist,which turned out to be factual. Trump seems to fit every item on the checklist. It seems it would be very great idea in the future to demand a mental fitness examination as well as a physical.
